tool_description: Applies visual filters and effects to images to enhance aesthetics and maintain consistent visual style across social media content.

input_image_url.description: URL or path to the input image

filter_type.description: Filter category: vintage, modern, black-white, sepia, vibrant, soft, dramatic, minimal

error_messages: Input image not accessible: Ensure input_image_url points to a valid image file.
Invalid filter type: Use one of [vintage, modern, black-white, sepia, vibrant, soft, dramatic, minimal].
Intensity out of range: Use value between 0.0 and 1.0.
Brightness out of range: Use value between -1.0 and 1.0.
Contrast out of range: Use value between -1.0 and 1.0.
Saturation out of range: Use value between -1.0 and 1.0.
usage: Provide input_image_url and filter_type, then fine-tune with intensity and adjustment parameters. The tool applies the filter and returns the processed image.

filtered_image_url.description: URL or path to the filtered image

processing_time.description: Time taken to process the filter in seconds
